1.content:
Your traveling down a snow road when you car veers off to the side causing a crash. Your phone is dead and you saw a house back down the road, not remembering how long a walk there would take, you set for the journey. Walking threw the snow wasn't bad at first, until the cold dry wind of the winter night blows right threw your clothing.
it has seem like its been a half an hour of pushing threw this snow. its getting very cold and you can feel your finger tips and your feet fell non existent. you feel the slight twinge of your bladder wanting release, but you ignore it because it giving you warmth.
starting to feel dizzy you see a light in the distance, having hope you hurry to it, tripping a few times and getting a face full of snow.
you get on the porch of a modern looking log cabin. much bigger the the tactical one or two room cabin.
You knock on the door
"help...." you say meekly and tired
no one answered,you try again but slightly louder
"Help Me im fafafafreezing: you say as you put your head against the door.
slapping the door almost with rhythmicity
closing your eyes with loosing hope that no one will answer, the door sings open..
in the split second before crashing to the ground you see a woman..... you pass out every thing just went black, you end up wetting your pants.

are you a boy or girl?
1.title: a long haul

11.content:
You wake up feeling sore, in front of a fire place.
you feel a padded thickness between your legs.
you gently get up ad have a look around
when you see a beautiful woman sitting on a couch reading a book.
"what happened were am I?"You say shyly

"oh hunny you passed out when i opened the door"she responds

"am...am I wearing a diaper?"you question

"yes sweetie, you wet your pants just after you passed out.
poor thing you must be hungry or thirsty. do u want some hot coco?"she said wile putting down her book

"sure that sounds nice" you say sitting up and grabbing the blankets she covered you with.
looking down "can I take this diaper off?"

"no leave it on for now, your pants are in the wash"she said coming back with some hot coco,
she gives you the cup

"thank you"you say sipping the coco

"whats your name"she said smiling

"oh sorry im Brandon, whats yours?"you said blushing

"my name is Jess, but you can call me mommy or mama"she said
you look at her with confusion why would she say that call her mommy?you thought

well what you didn't know that you were drinking a special mix of coco

what happened next?
11.title: Im a Real BOY
